item.description:
NOTE: This event is hosted and organized GenerationDesi.com and posted here for information purposes only. See details below.

!!...JOIN US FOR A NIGHT OF FUN, MASTI & IN DOWNTOWN CAMBRIDGE...!!

Limited Space!! First 50 Tickets are discounted only! We are expecting to sell out and have purposelly kept the tickets really cheap...the more the merrier people..the more the better the party! Lets do this...!!

This is a DANCE and DHAMAAL party...not a SIT and EAT food party!! Expected age group from 21+ to 30 somethings. Everyone welcome! No kids! Wear your most bling bling bindi and outfits! No sneakers..no caps, please dress spiffy!

This is our 5th year doing this..we have NO imitators!! :)

Get your Guaranteed Entry Discounted Tickets here. Please RSVP here if you have purchased tickets online or plan to attend. RSVP doesn't guarantee entry incase we are SOLD OUT.

WHEN:SATURDAY, OCT 23rd 2010
WHERE: Conga Lounge, 1 Eliot St, Cambridge
TIME: The Party goes till 2:00 AM! Please arrive early! Doors open 10:30 pm.

Plenty of Parking & Parking lots right across.
All our events sell out! Dont miss it!! Limited Space!

Please join our mailing list to be the first ones to find out about our next hot desi event at www.GenerationDesi.com!
item.name: Diwali Dhamaka Bollywood Nite 2010
